https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ePiabUJVmHSwXtW5t98bn7G2wxo.jpg Britain, A.D. 117. Quintus Dias, the sole survivor of a Pictish raid on a Roman frontier fort, marches north with General Virilus' legendary Ninth Legion, under orders to wipe the Picts from the face of the Earth and destroy their leader, Gorlacon. Centurion
